data.title: Greeting - Standard
data.content: Hi there, thanks for reaching out. I'm here to listen and support you. How are you feeling right now?

data.title: Greeting - Return Texter
data.content: Welcome back. I'm glad you reached out again. How have things been since we last talked?

data.title: Active Listening - Reflect
data.content: It sounds like you're going through a really difficult time. I want you to know that what you're feeling is valid.

data.title: Active Listening - Clarify
data.content: I want to make sure I understand. Can you tell me a bit more about what you mean by that?

data.title: Safety Check
data.content: I care about your safety. Are you having any thoughts of hurting yourself right now?

data.title: Safety Plan - Immediate
data.content: Your safety is the most important thing. Can we talk about what you can do right now to stay safe?

data.title: Coping Strategy - Grounding
data.content: Let's try a grounding exercise together. Can you name 5 things you can see, 4 you can touch, 3 you can hear, 2 you can smell, and 1 you can taste?

data.title: Coping Strategy - Breathing
data.content: Let's try some deep breathing together. Breathe in slowly for 4 counts, hold for 4, then breathe out for 4. We can do this together.

data.title: Resource - Crisis Line
data.content: If you're ever in immediate danger, please call 911 or go to your nearest emergency room. The 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline is available 24/7 by calling or texting 988.

data.title: Resource - SAMHSA
data.content: SAMHSA's National Helpline (1-800-662-4357) is a free, confidential treatment referral service available 24/7.

data.title: Wrap Up - Standard
data.content: It was really brave of you to reach out today. Remember, we're here for you anytime you need to talk. Take care of yourself.

data.title: Wrap Up - Follow Up
data.content: I'm glad we could talk today. We'd like to check in with you in a few days to see how you're doing. Is that okay?

data.title: Transfer Notice
data.content: I'm going to connect you with another member of our team who can help you further. They'll have the context of our conversation. You're in good hands.

data.title: Hold / Pause
data.content: I need just a moment to look into something for you. I'll be right back -- you're not alone.

data.title: Boundary Setting
data.content: I understand you're frustrated. I want to help, but I need us to communicate respectfully so I can support you the best way I can.
